amendment.description: An amendment numbered 384 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to prohibit U.S. military presence in Syria without Congressional approval within one year of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A028) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 273 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A028) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Bowman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A028) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 273 (Roll no. 335).
